SELECT e.id AS idEnvio, e.numGuia, e.fecha, e.costo, e.fechaEntrega,
d.id AS idDireccionOrigen, d.calle AS calleOrigen, d.numero AS numeroOrigen, d.colonia AS coloniaOrigen, d.codigoPostal AS codigoPostalOrigen, d.ciudad AS ciudadOrigen, d.estado AS estadoOrigen,
d2.id AS idDireccionDestino, d2.calle AS calleDestino, d2.numero AS numeroDestino, d2.colonia AS coloniaDestino, d2.codigoPostal AS codigoPostalDestino, d2.ciudad AS ciudadDestino, d2.estado AS estadoDestino,
c.id AS idConductor, c.noPersonal AS noPersonalConductor, p.id AS idColaborador, p.nombre AS nombreConductor, p.apellidoPaterno AS apellidoPaternoConductor, p.apellidoMaterno AS apellidoMaternoConductor, p.foto AS fotoConductor, p.CURP AS curpConductor, p.correo AS correoConductor,
cl.id AS idCliente, cl.telefono AS telefonoCliente, pcl.id as idPersonaCliente, pcl.nombre AS nombreCliente, pcl.apellidoPaterno AS apellidoPaternoCliente, pcl.apellidoMaterno AS apellidoMaternoCliente FROM Envio e INNER JOIN Direccion d ON e.idOrigen = d.id INNER JOIN Direccion d2 ON e.idDestino = d2.id INNER JOIN Colaborador c ON e.idConductor = c.id INNER JOIN Persona p ON c.idPersona = p.id INNER JOIN Cliente cl ON e.idCliente = cl.id INNER JOIN Persona pcl ON cl.idPersona = pcl.id WHERE e.numGuia = #{numGuia}
